title: Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite
content: , once you reach there, there will be turrets you will have to destroy, you will have to destroy them with lightning magic. Once thats complete, head to the back of the tower. You will see some Susser flowers, pick them up and it will create an anti magic field. Go through the door at the back of the tower, you will see a generator. Put the susser flowers into the generator and start it up, this will light up the tower. Head upstairs to explore and pick up the mushrooms along the way. After pick
